name: Solar Shield
description:
The sun threatens to destroy the planet via harsh Solar Flares! Delay the inevitable by collecting time fuel for both the shields and your own ship! But watch out, everything from damage, to Solar Flares, to even using your own weapons drains your precious time!

This game has controller support!

Controls:

Move Forward / Backward   ~   W/S, Up/Down Arrows, Left Joystick

Rotate   ~   A/D, Left/Right Arrows, Right Joystick

Fire Laser / Menu Confirm  ~  Enter, Space Bar, A Button, Right Trigger

Drop Bomb / Menu Back  ~  Both Shift Keys, B Button, Left Trigger

Exit Game  ~  Escape, Select Button
